TopicTitle: How can I change the resolution?

Articles.Content: It’s on steam and I don’t have one of the standard resolutions.

Hi, if it's like a ultra wide and you want to manually change resolution. Go into local disc c, user's, your user, ( you may have to show hidden folders here to see it) app data, local low, intercept games and open Kerbal Space Program 2. From there open Global and scroll down to settings.json down the bottom. Open with notepad and scroll down to screen resolution and change the values. Then save file. Hope that helps
